Name: Feral Moon
Phase11Description: I found the amulet in a great spider who had built its nest in the lair.  I should bring it to Edan.
Phase35Description: I met a strange farmer named Edan who is tortured by a strange call in his mind.  He asked me to venture into Sarat's Lair and retrieve an item that might help him.
Toast: Help Edan ward off the strange call.
